typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(RANK as long)) ~> Rank1
Rank1 rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(DENSE_RANK as long),
	dense: true) ~> Rank2
